pain.t.fx_2021

Class DrawMath

  • java.lang.Object
    • pain.t.fx_2021.DrawMath

  • public class DrawMath
extends java.lang.Object

    Encapsulates math for some drawing tools

    Methods for Draw Tools Abstracts and cleans original implementation
    Since:
    2021-10-07
    See Also:
    ToolBarManager

    • Method Detail

      • mathRectangle

        public static double[] mathRectangle(java.lang.Double lineFirstX,
                                     java.lang.Double lineFirstY,
                                     java.lang.Double currentX,
                                     java.lang.Double currentY)
        Returns an array of four doubles that are calculated from user's input while drawing.
        Parameters:
        lineFirstX - Double of user's mouse press to start draw
        lineFirstY - Double of user's mouse press to start draw
        currentX - Double of user's mouse location when this is called
        currentY - Double of user's mouse location when this is called
        Returns:
        double_array of Upper X+Y Coordinates, width, and height
        See Also:
        ToolBarManager

      • mathPolygon

        public static java.util.ArrayList<double[]> mathPolygon(java.lang.Double lineFirstX,
                                                        java.lang.Double lineFirstY,
                                                        java.lang.Double currentX,
                                                        java.lang.Double currentY,
                                                        int vertices)
        Returns an array of two paired double ArrayLists derived from user's input while drawing.
        Parameters:
        lineFirstX - Double of user's mouse press to start draw
        lineFirstY - Double of user's mouse press to start draw
        currentX - Double of user's mouse location when this is called
        currentY - Double of user's mouse location when this is called
        vertices - Int from userInput field, ranges from 3+
        Returns:
        double_array_list
        See Also:
        ToolBarManager

      • mathCircle

        public static double[] mathCircle(java.lang.Double lineFirstX,
                                  java.lang.Double lineFirstY,
                                  java.lang.Double currentX,
                                  java.lang.Double currentY)
        Returns an array of doubles for X+Y coordinates and diameter. Diameter is later passed as both height and width. Parameters derived from user's input while drawing.
        Parameters:
        lineFirstX - Double of user's mouse press to start draw
        lineFirstY - Double of user's mouse press to start draw
        currentX - Double of user's mouse location when this is called
        currentY - Double of user's mouse location when this is called
        Returns:
        double_array
        See Also:
        ToolBarManager
